name: Ensure AWS Inspector is configured for EC2 Instances
body: AWS Inspector is a security assessment service, used to assess applications for vulnerabilities or deviations from best practices. It is recommended to run AWS Inspector scans regularly.
remediationDescription: Follow the [AWS Article](https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/set-up-amazon-inspector/) describing how to set up AWS Inspector for your instances. Additionally, we also recommend to set up periodic scans through Recurring Assessment Runs.
